sentences.sContent: a painting that invokes images of the Rocky Mountains
sentences.sCn: 使人联想到落基山脉的画

sentences.sContent: During his speech, he invoked the memory of Harry Truman.
sentences.sCn: 他演讲时使人想起哈里 · 杜鲁门。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + voke(喊， 唤) → 唤起 → 实行

trans.tranOther: to make a particular idea, image, or feeling appear in people’s minds by describing an event or situation, or by talking about a person
